comment: Sweet molasses and rye. It's tasty but idk if I want more
Aggressively spicy, in a good way, complimented by a bit of a vanilla nose. Very nice neat with a touch of seltzer.

Color: Light Amber

Nose: Spice, dark chocolate, brown sugar, coffee, oak, and salted caramel.

Palate: Peppery, mint, dry, orange peel, and dark chocolate.

Finish: Lingering spice, mint, sweetness fades, and oak.
Perfect for Rye cocktails. Strong spice, but not overpowering. Smoother than expected.
